haproxy-vhost.description: External address for access to the OGC Preview server. This should be added as an A entry in your DNS.

config-dir.description: Host location containing OGC Preview configuration over-rides (announcements.json, opConfig.js, etc.). This setting should be left blank unless custom settings are required.

geoserver.description: Settings used to connect Apache reverse proxy entries to backing GeoServer.

hostname.description: Cluster internal addressable location of backing GeoServer. Defaults to the marathon-lb hostname to route to service port in a clustered GeoServer configuration.

port.description: Service port of the GeoServer instance.
